scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:build && npm run deploy:upload
scripts.deploy:build: env NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --optional es7.functionBind --optional es7.decorators --optional es7.asyncFunctions ] -p licensify -e src/index.js | uglifyjs -c --comments '/generated by licensify/' -o public/js/app.js
scripts.watch: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --optional es7.functionBind --optional es7.decorators --optional es7.asyncFunctions ] -e src/index.js -o public/js/app.js
